RELIABLE & SAFE

Current Accounts

This is the right choice in personal checking when you want monthly statements with imaged checks.

There is no per-check fee, and you have unlimited check writing. You’ll receive monthly statements, along with images of your canceled checks. Avoid the monthly fee of just $500 for Personal Checking with a $900 minimum daily balance or a $15,000 average monthly balance. You’ll have our free Artisfinans LTD CheckCard, which is also your ATM Card.

The Service You Deserve

Being a member of a Artis Stanbic Holdings is not like opening an account at the usual bank. You have a voice in what and how the organization is run.
